code:
---
config:
  theme: base
  flowchart:
    curve: basis
    nodeSpacing: 55
    rankSpacing: 70
    padding: 8
  themeVariables:
    fontFamily: ''
    fontSize: 15px
    lineColor: '#3A3A3A'
    textColor: '#111'
    primaryBorderColor: '#2B2B2B'
    clusterBkg: '#FFFFFF'
    clusterBorder: '#D0D0D0'
  layout: dagre
---
flowchart LR
 subgraph O[Health_Sync]
    direction TB
        OUT[Health_Sync]
  end
    DEF[Health_Scan] -- defines “45%” --> BARG[Health_Vault]
    SOFT[Health_Vault] -- affects bargaining --> BARG
    COMP[Health_Agent] -- adds constraints --> BARG
    GOV[Health_Vault] -- shifts boundaries --> VFI[Health_Agent]
    DISC[Health_Sync] -- adds load --> VFI
    ABF[Health_Scan] -- feeds data --> DEF
    BARG -- resets rules --> DEF
    BARG -- tightens audits --> COMP
    BARG -- extends deals --> SOFT
    BARG -- sets integration terms --> GOV
    VFI -- spillover demand --> OUT
    DISC -- occupancy loop --> OUT
    OUT -- media pressure --> POL[Health_Vault]
    POL -- changes stance --> BARG
    OUT -- crisis response --> BARG
    POL -. narrative .-> DEF

     OUT:::outcome
     DEF:::secondary
     BARG:::primary
     SOFT:::secondary
     COMP:::secondary
     GOV:::secondary
     VFI:::primary
     DISC:::secondary
     ABF:::secondary
     POL:::primary
    classDef primary fill:#FFF2CC,stroke:#8A6D00,stroke-width:2px,color:#111,rx:12,ry:12
    classDef secondary fill:#DFF1FF,stroke:#0B5FA5,stroke-width:1.6px,color:#111,rx:12,ry:12
    classDef outcome fill:#FFE0E0,stroke:#B23B3B,stroke-width:2px,color:#111,rx:12,ry:12
    style OUT fill:#FFD6D6,stroke:#8F1F1F,stroke-width:3px
    style O fill:#FFF2F2,stroke:#E6A1A1,stroke-width:1.5px
